 807          scale = 56. 
 808          x_cm = x - x.mean(axis=-1).reshape((3,1)) 
 809          r = Rigid3D.make_r_euler(angles, mode='x') 
 810          res = Rigid3D.find_32_constr_ck_multi( 
 811              x=x_cm, y=scale * np.dot(r, x_cm)[:2,:], scale=None, cm=False,  
 812              use_jac=True, ninit=self.ninit, randome=True, randoms=True) 
 813          np_test.assert_almost_equal(res.optimizeResult.fun, 0, decimal=3)

1630          np_test.assert_almost_equal(y, y_desired) 
1631

1638          y = rigid3d.transform(x=x_cs) 
1639          np_test.assert_almost_equal(y, y_desired) 
1640           
1641          # xy_axes=dim_point 
1642          rigid3d = Rigid3D() 
1643          rigid3d.s_scalar = s 
1644          y_desired = s * np.dot(r, x_cs) 
1645          y = rigid3d.transform(x=x_cs, q=r) 
1646          np_test.assert_almost_equal(y, y_desired) 
1647           
1648          # xy_axes=dim_point 
1649          rigid3d = Rigid3D() 
1650          y_desired = s * np.dot(r, x_cs) + np.expand_dims(d, 1) 
1651          y = rigid3d.transform(x=x_cs, q=r, s=s, d=d) 
1652          np_test.assert_almost_equal(y, y_desired) 
1653           
1654          # xy_axes=dim_point, xy_axes='point_dim' 
1655          rigid3d = Rigid3D() 
1656          rigid3d.q = r 
1657          rigid3d.s_scalar = s 
1658          rigid3d.d = d 
1659          y_desired = s * np.inner(x_cs.transpose(), r) + d 
1660          y = rigid3d.transform(x=x_cs.transpose(), xy_axes='point_dim') 
1661          np_test.assert_almost_equal(y, y_desired) 
1662           
1663          # d=None, xy_axes='point_dim' 
1664          rigid3d = Rigid3D() 
1665          y_desired = s * np.inner(x_cs.transpose(), r) 
1666          y = rigid3d.transform(x=x_cs.transpose(), q=r, s=s, xy_axes='point_dim') 
1667          np_test.assert_almost_equal(y, y_desired)

1957          r3d.q = r3d.make_r_euler( 
1958              angles=[-pi/2, -pi/2, pi/2], mode='zxz_ex_active') 
1959          r3d.s_scalar = 1 
1960          desired = np.array( 
1961              [[0,0,5,6,0], 
1962               [0,0,4,0,0], 
1963               [0,0,3,0,0], 
1964               [0,0,2,0,0], 
1965               [0,0,1,0,0]]) 
1966          transd = r3d.transformArray(array=gg, origin=[4,4,4]) 
1967          np_test.assert_almost_equal(transd[4,4,4], 3) 
1968          np_test.assert_almost_equal(transd[2:7,2:7,4], desired) 
1969
